title: Leave clg after sem2
content: I'm a partial dropper and I had a question. If one wants to leave PES after first year do they gotta pay all 4 years' fees? I heard ts anywhere and I'm scared especially cause I'm in through PESSAT

comments.body: roam naked and theyll itself send you out as simple as that
ukw I'll keep that in my back pocket, just incase

You have to pay only the fees for the sems you've completed  
If you wanna exit PES anytime in-between you can withdraw without having to pay fees for the rest of the years
You won't have a back pocket if you do this /s
for kcet, yes (as far as i remeber we'd signed some agreement during the counselling). PESSAT, no
